# Task Backlog

> **Living backlog for Claude-driven projects.**
> Update this file as you work. Claude reads it at session start.

---

## How to Use with Claude

1. **Session Start:** Tell Claude to read this file first
2. **During Work:** Ask Claude to update task status as items complete
3. **Session End:** Review and reorganize sections
4. **Handoffs:** New sessions or team members start here

**Status Legend:**
- `[ ]` — Not started
- `[~]` — In progress
- `[x]` — Completed
- `[!]` — Blocked

---

## Inbox (Unsorted)

> New items land here. Review daily and move to appropriate section.

- [ ]

---

## Next 7 Days (Priority)

> Work planned for this week. Pull from here into "In Progress."

- [ ]

---

## In Progress

> Currently active work. Limit to 1-3 items to maintain focus.

- [~]

---

## Blocked

> Items waiting on external input, reviews, or dependencies.

| Task | Blocker | Since |
|------|---------|-------|
|  |  |  |

---

## Done (Recent)

> Completed items. Archive to bottom after one week.

- [x]

---

## Archive

<details>
<summary>Completed items (older than 7 days)</summary>

- [x]

</details>

---

## Claude Instructions

```xml
<planning_rules>
When working with this task backlog:

1. READ this file at the start of each session
2. PULL items from "Next 7 Days" into "In Progress" when starting work
3. UPDATE status immediately when completing tasks
4. ADD new items discovered during work to "Inbox"
5. MOVE blocked items with clear blocker descriptions
6. NEVER delete items — move to Done or Archive

After completing any task, update this file with:
- [x] Task description (completed YYYY-MM-DD)
</planning_rules>
```
